sourcesContent:
var customParseFormat = require('dayjs/plugin/customParseFormat') dayjs.extend(customParseFormat) import React from "react" import {Col, Row} from "react-bootstrap" import {Link } from "react-router-dom" import dayjs from "dayjs" import ReactHtmlParser from 'react-html-parser'; const List = (props) => { const renderList = (props) => { return (<>
{props.orchestra}
{props.conductor ?ReactHtmlParser(`
Conductor: ${props.conductor}
`):''}
{props.title}
{`${dayjs(props.month).format('MMMM')} ${props.day} ${props.year} ${props.time}`} {`${props.city} ${props.country}`}
{`${props.day}`}
{`${dayjs(props.month).format('MMMM')}`}
{`${props.year}`}
 ) } return props.orchestra ? renderList(props):null } export default List
